events.name: March Meetup - Adam Drake, CDO of Skyscanner and Jeff Markham of Hortonworks
events.description: Two great speakers this month! Adam Drake , CDO of Skyscanner , one of the leading flight, hotel and car price search and comparison engines, will be talking about "Data at Skyscanner." Jeff Markham , Technical Director, APAC for Hortonworks will be discussing security in Hadoop and giving a hand-on demo of the new Apache Ranger. Of course there will be the usually socialising and camaraderie of some of Singapore's best and brightest big data minds...
events.location: IDA Labs @ NDC National Design Centre , 111 Middle Road, #03-04 Singapore 188969

events.name: Workshop: Building your 1st Kanban board
events.description: Building your first Kanban board can be very daunting. We'll make it more approachable and easy for you! You may have heard about this thing called Kanban or you have have a friend or colleague who told you about it. And it may (or may not) sounds easy to implement at first. But how do you actually go about it? This workshop will give you an easy approach to start your first Kanban board! There won't be much theory (although I'll give pointers if you want them) - the central theme of this meetup is DOING! Sign up if you are interested in learning more about how to achieve outcomes and metrics that matter. This applies to people in all kinds of industries - eg. law firms or people working in HR! Soft drinks will be provided (courtesy of Microsoft). Contact me if you would like to sponsor pizza!
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, 22nd Floor, One Marina Boulevard, NTUC Cebtre
